title: Payment Error?
body:
So I've gone through to purchase some Riot Points with my debit card and I got an error message saying

>ERROR: Your payment attempt has been declined by your card provider. Please contact your provider for more information.

I called up yesterday and today and on their end, they can't see any reason to why it would be doing this so I was just wondering if anyone else was having issues with card payments on League at the moment? 

- Alessi {{champion:497}}

replies.body:
It's a strange one. Submit a ticket to player support and they should be able to help you further.

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new

FYI: The login for the support page and the website (boards) are seperate. 
https://i.imgur.com/IrSBuzi.png?noredirect

There are currently issues with the login transition preventing players from easily logging into support. There are two current workarounds:

1. Open the support page in an incognito/private window and follow the process as normal, pressing the login button when prompted.

2. Log out of the website **from the support page**, and then follow the process as normal, pressing login when prompted.

If your support page has the blank "OC" login in the top right, you're good to go. If it only has your summoner icon with "OCEANIA" it means the support page is seeing you as logged in on the website and not in support. You need to follow one of the steps above.
